General.Name: Elanders AB Series B
General.Description: Elanders AB (publ), a logistics company, provides supply chain management, and print and packaging solutions in Sweden and internationally. It offers global order management; sourcing and procurement; custom configuration and assembly; warehousing and inventory management; and print and packaging services. The company also provides fulfillment and distribution; freight; after sales; renewed tech; and e-commerce services. In addition, it sells photo products under the fotokasten and myphotobook brands. It serves automotive, electronics, fashion and lifestyle, health care and life science, and industrial sectors. The company was incorporated in 1908 and is headquartered in Mölndal, Sweden. Elanders AB (publ) is a subsidiary of Carl Bennet AB.
